name.title: A short name for the environment. Contains no spaces.
name.description: The name of the run-time environment. Each environment name should be unique within a solution.

description.title: A short description of the run-time environment.
description.description: The description of the run-time environment. Try to include the purpose or use of the environment.

isProduction.title: Whether this environment is a production environment (true) or not (false).
isProduction.description: Specifies which environment(s) are used for production or not. Affects how devops processes and the NOX runtime is configured.

variables.title: The variables and values for this environment.
variables.description: A key/value pair of environment variables used in this environment and their defaults.

title: A definition for a run-time environments.
description: A definition for the name, variables and other pertinent information pertaining to a run-time environment.
